topic.title: ORGANISATION SITE IDENTIFIER (OF PROVIDER CANCER DECISION TO TREAT)
topic.shortdesc: ORGANISATION SITE IDENTIFIER (OF PROVIDER CANCER DECISION TO TREAT) is the ORGANISATION SITE IDENTIFIER of the ORGANISATION SITE acting as Health Care Provider where the decision to treat the PATIENT was made which initiated a Cancer Care Plan with one or more Planned Cancer Treatments.
